messages.message:
Hi team, seeing interesting patterns with classification when file splitting is turned on vs. off.

When file splitting is turned on, the two SOV docs that I uploaded are classified as "Other". When it's turned off, they're correctly classified as SOVs. The project is here (https://aihub.instabase.com/build/01975f59-a295-7598-9d36-a256259b8d9a). Interesting because the files themselves are not split, but the classification is impacted
is this because we're doing splitting and classification in a single `ibllm` pipeline? <!subteam^S06395ZEFSL>
